mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id as empid , e.first_name || ' ' || e.last_name as ename , e.hire_date as hiredate , e.salary as salary , d.department_name as departmentname FROM employees e, departments d WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id AND e.employee_id = #{empid}
